definitions.definition: The Hindu goddess of wealth , the consort of Vishnu and married to Rāma (in her incarnation as Sita ) and Krishna (as Radha and Rukmini ).
A female given name from Sanskrit used in India.

main_definition: The Hindu goddess of wealth , the consort of Vishnu and married to Rāma (in her incarnation as Sita ) and Krishna (as Radha and Rukmini ).
secondary_definitions: A female given name from Sanskrit used in India.
